data.title: Olympic 2024 Medal Count: Final Tally, Winners from Day 12 Early Events
data.meta_description: A unique set of events handed out medals on Wednesday morning at the 2024 Summer Olympics. The mixed race walk relay, women's speed sport climbing and theâ€¦
data.text:
The United States and China are back level on top of the gold medal table at the 2024 Summer Olympics.

Team USA and China each have 24 golds at the Paris Games after China took gold in the men's 61kg weightlifting event.

The United States added to their medal total in that event, though, thanks to a bronze from Hampton Morris.

Team USA has a massive edge in overall medals, but some work is left to do to clear China in the race for the most golds. The Americans will try to gain some separation in the afternoon's track and field events.

Weightlifting is not typically a medal-producing sport for the Americans at the Summer Olympics.

Morris' bronze gave Team USA more third-place finishes than any spot on the medal podiums in Paris. Team USA has 24 gold medals, 31 silver and 32 bronze.
